Header.title: EMON EMPLOYMENT SERVICES
Header.paragraph: EMON EMPLOYMENT SERVICES is a top manpower and recruitment agency in the Bangladesh, duly licensed by the Bangladesh Overseas Administration. It is engaged in the placement of highly qualified and trained skilled and unskilled workers overseas.

About.paragraph: Emon Employment Services, a renowned manpower recruitment agency and a sister concern of Mercury Group which was established at Dhaka in 1990, securing the legal recruitment license no RL773 issued by the Government of the peopleâ€™s republic of Bangladesh to trade in manpower export. Bangladesh is extremely rich in human resource having vast resource of exportable surplus of professionals, technicians, skilled, semi-skilled and unskilled workers. EES has become one of the leading and most dependable and efficient manpower export house of the country. The organisation is staffed by a team of experienced and dynamic executives and personnel. We therefore, confidently invite you to the world of EES where your needs of Bangladeshi manpower will be handled most professionally to your satisfaction.

Services.name: Manpower Outsourcing
Services.text: We have been working with companies all over the world to provide the necessary skilled and unskilled manpower according to the demand.

Services.name: Medical Center
Services.text: Emon Employment Services has its own medical centre from where we arrange medical tests for our candidates' visa applications.

Services.name: Training
Services.text: Emon Employment Services has its own training centre from where we provide all the necessery training for the employees to acquire skill for the desired job.

Services.name: Employee Recruiment
Services.text: We receive a demand letter from the company, then we post a circular on newspaper. We then go through detailed selection upon interview. Once selected we train and provide employees in all sectors, both locally and internationally according to the requirements.

Services.name: Visa Processing
Services.text: We are processing all types of visas. We process tourist, employment, student and residency visa.

Services.name: Air Tickets
Services.text: We have our own travel agency to serve employees all over the world. We provide air tickets on a reasonable price to arrange safe and affordable travel for employees.
